Regarding:

> Regardless of how the vendors implement MLAG neighbor loss detection, it’s inevitably less reliable than using a physical link bundle as a peer link

If the MLAG peer switches are close to each other, e.g., a pair of top-of-rack switches, a virtual peer link can make use of both the uplinks and a direct connection (e.g., a physical link bundle) as part of the underlay.
